articles.title: Biden says America will ban Russian oil; U.S. says up to 4,000 of Putin's soldiers have been killed - CNBC
articles.description: Ukraine's armed forces said Tuesday that the pace of Russia's invasion has "slowed significantly."
articles.content:
The Russian military on Tuesday declared a fresh cease-fire in five Ukrainian cities, according to state-run media. But evacuation routes will lead to Russia.

articles.title: American billionaire Todd Boehly makes first Chelsea bid and awaits Roman Abramovich's decision - The Telegraph
articles.description: Boehly-led bid, which involves Swiss billionaire Hansjorg Wyss and one other unnamed businessman, has officially been submitted
articles.content:
American billionaire Todd Boehly is waiting to find out whether or not Roman Abramovich will accept his bid to buy Chelsea.

articles.title: Mayo Clinic: COVID-19 heading toward endemic - KSTP
articles.description: While COVID-19 is still a pandemic, Americans may start hearing becoming familiar with a new word: endemic.
articles.content:
Two years after COVID-19 swept the globe and was declared a pandemic, outbreaks are waning again.

articles.title: New species of extinct vampire-squid–like cephalopod is the first of its kind with ten functional arms - Phys.org
